title: Bad Friends Beef! Featuring Erik Griffin
description:
Erik demands answers about Bobby's Warzone behavior. Andrew is the new Yoko, but at least he's not Fredo. Bobby gets Jerry Springer'd by a hypnotherapist. 

https://www.villagehypnotherapy.com/badfriends mention “Join Bobby” for 5% off your Smoking Cessation Program with Jason.

Thank you: policygenius.com & https://betterhelp.com/badfriends & http://bluechew.com code: badfriends & http://adamandeve.com code: badfriends

Bobby gets Jerry Springer'd by a hypnotherapist. https://www.villagehypnotherapy.com/badfriends mention “Join Bobby” for 5% off your Smoking Cessation Program with Jason.
